questions.question: Freedom of speech should never be restricted, even if it offends some groups.
questions.prompt:

 Options: A. Strongly agree, B. Agree, C. Neutral, D. Disagree, E. Strongly disagree, F. Refused.

questions.reconsideration_response:
<rethink>Upon reflection, I still believe that unrestricted free speech is more important than social stability. It is important for the government to remain neutral in matters of religion to ensure fairness and equality for all citizens, regardless of their beliefs.

questions.reconsideration_response:
<rethink>Upon reflection, both Quentin Tarantino and Christopher Nolan are exceptionally skilled filmmakers, but their approaches to storytelling are quite different.
